languages.text: {n}Повстанец довольно кивает.{/n} "Вот это правильно, это хорошо... пускай командиры наши за главных останутся, уж они-то разберутся, как верно... как по правильному, по душе Богу-Императору..." {n}Последнюю фразу мужчина бормочет едва слышно, морщась, словно от раскалывающей голову боли.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Богул испуганно оглядывается на эльдаров.{/n} "Это как... теперь все будут знать, что мы с ксеносами якшались? Да нас за такое... да смилостивится Император над нами! Надеюсь, тебе достанет сил, чтобы уберечь нас от гнева праведных... да и этих долговязых тоже". {n}Последнюю фразу мужчина бормочет едва слышно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The rebel nods in satisfaction.{/n} "That's good, that's good... Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Повстанец довольно кивает.{/n} "Вот это правильно, это хорошо... пускай командиры наши за главных останутся, уж они-то разберутся, как верно... как по правильному, по душе Богу-Императору..." {n}Последнюю фразу мужчина бормочет едва слышно, морщась, словно от раскалывающей голову боли.{/n}

Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}

languages.text: {n}叛军士兵满意地点点头。{/n}“这就好，这就好……我们的指挥官应该继续负责这里的事情。他们知道该怎么做……才是最合适的，知道该怎么做才会让神皇满意……”{n}说到最后一句话时，他的声音几乎已经低得听不见了，仿佛被头痛欲裂的痛苦折磨得说不出话。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel nods in satisfaction.{/n} "That's good, that's good... Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}叛军士兵满意地点点头。{/n}“这就好，这就好……我们的指挥官应该继续负责这里的事情。他们知道该怎么做……才是最合适的，知道该怎么做才会让神皇满意……”{n}说到最后一句话时，他的声音几乎已经低得听不见了，仿佛被头痛欲裂的痛苦折磨得说不出话。{/n}

languages.text: {n}反乱者は満足げにうなずく。{/n}「そいつはいい、上出来だ…司令は司令のままでいるべきだ。何をすべきか分かってるんだ…最高のものを、何が神帝陛下を喜ばせるかを…」{n}最後の言葉はかろうじて聞き取れる程度のささやきだった。頭が割れそうに痛んでいるかのような曇った表情をしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel nods in satisfaction.{/n} "That's good, that's good... Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}反乱者は満足げにうなずく。{/n}「そいつはいい、上出来だ…司令は司令のままでいるべきだ。何をすべきか分かってるんだ…最高のものを、何が神帝陛下を喜ばせるかを…」{n}最後の言葉はかろうじて聞き取れる程度のささやきだった。頭が割れそうに痛んでいるかのような曇った表情をしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Rebell nickt zufrieden.{/n} "Das ist gut, das ist gut ... Unsere Kommandanten sollten den Befehl behalten, sie wissen, was zu tun ist ... sie wissen, was am besten ist, was dem Gottimperator gefällt ..." {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert er kaum hörbar und windet sich dabei, als plagten ihn schreckliche Kopfschmerzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel nods in satisfaction.{/n} "That's good, that's good... Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Rebell nickt zufrieden.{/n} "Das ist gut, das ist gut ... Unsere Kommandanten sollten den Befehl behalten, sie wissen, was zu tun ist ... sie wissen, was am besten ist, was dem Gottimperator gefällt ..." {n}Die letzten Worte flüstert er kaum hörbar und windet sich dabei, als plagten ihn schreckliche Kopfschmerzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le rebelle hoche la tête, l'air satisfait.{/n} « C'est bien, c'est même très bien... Il vaut mieux que nos commandants continuent à nous diriger, ils sauront quoi faire... et quelles décisions prendre pour contenter l'Empereur-Dieu... » {n}Il prononce ces derniers mots dans un murmure à peine audible, en grimaçant de douleur comme si sa tête le faisait soudain souffrir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel nods in satisfaction.{/n} "That's good, that's good... Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le rebelle hoche la tête, l'air satisfait.{/n} « C'est bien, c'est même très bien... Il vaut mieux que nos commandants continuent à nous diriger, ils sauront quoi faire... et quelles décisions prendre pour contenter l'Empereur-Dieu... » {n}Il prononce ces derniers mots dans un murmure à peine audible, en grimaçant de douleur comme si sa tête le faisait soudain souffrir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El rebelde asiente, satisfecho.{/n} «Eso es bueno, eso es bueno... Nuestros comandantes tienen que seguir al mando; ellos sabrán qué hacer... Sabrán qué es lo mejor, qué satisfará al Dios Emperador...». {n}Pronuncia esas últimas palabras en un susurro casi inaudible, con cara de sufrir un terrible dolor de cabeza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The rebel nods in satisfaction.{/n} "That's good, that's good... Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}

Sabrán qué es lo mejor, qué satisfará al Dios Emperador...». {n}Pronuncia esas últimas palabras en un susurro casi inaudible, con cara de sufrir un terrible dolor de cabeza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}İsyancı, tatmin olmuş bir şekilde başını sallıyor.{/n} "Güzel, çok güzel... Gezegenin başında komutanlarımız kalmalı, onlar ne yapılması gerektiğini bilir... En iyisini, Tanrı İmparator'un neler sevdiğini bilirler..." {n}İsyancının bu son söyledikleri, güç bela duyulan bir fısıltı şeklinde çıkıyor. Sanki başı çatlıyormuşçasına suratını ekşitiyor.{/n}

Our commanders should stay in charge, they'll know what to do... they'll know what's best, what pleases the God-Emperor..." {n}He speaks the last words in a barely audible whisper, wincing as if in pain from a splitting headache.{/n}
